data.title: Working At GoldenSource: Company Overview and Culture
data.meta_description: Learn about working at GoldenSource from employee reviews and detailed data on culture, salaries, demographics, management, financial, and more.
data.text:
GoldenSource overview

Industry

Software

Revenue

Employees

350

Founded In

Organization Type

Private

Social Media

GoldenSource focuses on enterprise data management solutions and provides financial services industry with software and expertise. It provides data governance and data quality control to create new gold copy data for any domain, including instruments, parties, prices, corporate actions, products, and positions. The company delivers firm wide master data management for trading, compliance, risk management, settlements, and accounting purposes. It controls data flows and spends across operational, strategic, and regulatory initiatives. The clients of the company are Charles SCHWAB, CITICS, COMMERZBANK, Deutsche Bank, HSBC, M&G, and Nordea. GoldenSource is a U.S.-based company that was founded in 1984.

Founded in 1984, GoldenSource is an established company that loves to hire graduates from Pace University, with 10.0% of its employees having attended Pace University. Want to compare GoldenSource to some other great places to work in New York, NY? We suggest taking a look at Zippia's list of Best Companies to Work For in New York, NY.The average employee at GoldenSource makes $98,792 per year. Pay at GoldenSource is significantly lower than some of its highest paying competitors, like DocuSign, Workday, and Square, which pay $135,649, $125,723, and $119,615, respectively.

Based in New York, NY, GoldenSource is a medium-sized technology company with 350 employees and a revenue of $30.0M.
